title: account is tied to an old inaccessible email
body:
I have been trying to log into my account and it only tells me either my password or email is wrong.(im certain they are correct, after many attempts) i go through all the steps to recover both but it asks me for an email, or sends a confirmation to an email. I cant access the email anymore, after contacting hotmail and many attempts to do so, i cannot.
I have been using the account on a near daily basis and only ran into this problem on 08/17/17. i have access to another account and it doesn't seem any activity is happening since i myself last played so i don't believe it was a malicious third party, and like i stated before the information i used has been accurate every day until this incident.
I have sent an email to support@riotgames.com and am awaiting a response.
The information i do have, is account name, screen name, and the old email in question, billing information and the dates they took place and contents of the loot i currently have.

just wondering if i need to include any more information and the time it may take to fix, because i purchased the arcade quest bundle and some missions are available for 24 hours.

replies.body: No worries, our account team can help update your info.  Just to be safe, I do recommend checking out our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) guide for extra practices.  The info in your email is a good start, but your account specialist will likely have additional questions to ask you.  Try to remember as much as you can if that does happen, because we want to be absolutely sure it gets back to the owner.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!

i have been contacted by email and am currently receiving assistance.
thank you for the response and i will return to the forum if any more issues occur.
thank you.
I do need to mention that this account i am using to post this isnt the account i am having issues with. How will i be reached if i cannot access the email or account?
